轣轣轣

轣字的基本解释

轣
lì
〔轣轆（
l?）〕ａ．缫丝车；ｂ．车的轨道，借指诡道，即欺诳，因“诡道”与“轨道”谐音；ｃ．车轮或辘轳等转动的声音，如“青丝玉井声轣轣。”

轣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《集韻》狼狄切，入錫，來。］
见“轣轆”。

轣字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　轣； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1250第02
【集韻】郞狄切，音歷。【博雅】車軌道謂之轣轆。

轣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
轣字的起名意思

暂无。

Shi
Basic explanation of words
Shi
lì
〔轣辘(
l?)] a. Silk reeling car; b. The track of the car refers to the deception, that is, deception, because "the deception" and the "track" are homophonic; c. The rotating sound of wheels or wheels, such as "the sound of the blue silk jade well."
Shi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lì］
["Ji Yun" Lang Di cut, enter the tin, come. ]
See "Roller".
Shi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　轣; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1250 No. 02
[Jiyun] Yin Diqie, sound calendar. [Bo Ya] The car track is called a reel.
Shi
